original: 陳留浚儀人。素有才名，但因屢次譏刺曹操，而被曹操所殺，導致兗州士大夫恐懼不已。陳宮等迎呂布入兗，共謀叛曹，不可謂與此事無關。
text: Chen Liujun Yiren. He is known for his talents, but because he repeatedly ridiculed Cao Cao, he was killed by Cao Cao, which caused Yanzhou scholar officials to fear. Chen Gong and others welcome Lv Bu into Yan and conspired to betray Cao.
